forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of San Francisco, the day unfolds under bright, sunlit skies, promising a delightful ambiance painted in hues of blue. With a gentle breeze whispering through the streets, the temperature, hovering in the comfortable range of mid-sixties, invites one to venture outdoors. While some might expect the fog to creep in, today stands apart, offering a panoramic view with only the faintest hint of the marine layer lingering along the perimeter of the Golden Gate. The air, crisp yet inviting, suggests a day that is both refreshing and uplifting.

As evening approaches, the forecast hints at a shift; the clarity of the day will yield to partly cloudy skies. A light jacket may serve you well as you transition from the warmth of the afternoon into the cooler embrace of the night. Consider a stroll through one of the city's vibrant neighborhoods, allowing the light to guide your path, or perhaps a quiet moment in the park to watch the sun dip below the horizon. Whether you explore the many flavors of the local dining scene or simply enjoy a leisurely walk with a friend, today is positioned to be an experience worth savoring.
